Release 1.0.13 - 2013-02-05

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), biobabel-core and junit.rafalcan

Updated to latest version of biomart-adapter, which fixes issue with reaction links. Fixes 113.rafalcan

Avoided repetition of pathways by checking the existence of an element in the DOM. Fixes 106.rafalcan

Updated to latest version of literature-adapter, which speeds up the literature tab. Fixes 121.rafalcan

Updated to latest version of ep-core, which fixes issue with missing structure thumbnails (when there are theoretical models involved). Fixes 83.rafalcan

Release 1.0.12 - 2012-10-31

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.11 - 2012-10-25

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.10 - 2012-10-25

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.9 - 2012-10-25

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.8 - 2012-10-17

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest versions of ep-core - which allows retrieval of cofactors and fixes tomcat suicides -, intenz-adapter - which can take data from the new IntEnz web service -, literature-adapter - which is faster now - and das-adapter - with partially implemented JMX configuration. Fixes 34, 110, 120.rafalcan

Added section for cofactors in small molecules tab.rafalcan

Cache size increased to 100 (open sessions are usually around 70).rafalcan

Fixed configuration for searches: maxUniprotResults down to 500, maxResults down to 500 (users won't be bothered if they get 500 results instead of 1000). Fixes 121.rafalcan

Fixed JSP for citation types other than journal article.rafalcan

Added number of citations per tab/type.rafalcan

Added filters for citation types (only visible when there are more than journal articles).rafalcan

Release 1.0.7 - 2012-08-23

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest versions of ep-core - which fixes bug related to redundant pathways - and reactome-adapter. Fixes 105.rafalcan

Fixed issue with missing pathway descriptions. Fixes 106.rafalcan

Release 1.0.6 - 2012-08-21

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest versions of ep-core - which fixes bug related to extra reactions shown and removes System.out.println's -, ep-util, mega-mapper - which fixes 'too many open cursors' issue - and junit (in case we write some tests at some point).rafalcan

Release 1.0.5 - 2012-08-14

TypeChangesBy

Fixed the health check filter configuration.rafalcan

Fixed href to Reactome reactions. Fixes 97.rafalcan

Release 1.0.4 - 2012-08-07

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.3 - 2012-08-02

TypeChangesBy

Forced version of rhea-adapter to override the transitive dependency, which fixes coefficients of reaction participants. Fixed also in the JSP. Fixes 90.rafalcan

Forced version of literature-adapter, which fixes issues with the CiteXplore web service resulting in missing literature filters or even no citations at all. Fixes 89, 98.rafalcan

Forced versions of ep-util, which fixes serious issue with searches resulting in no results at all. Fixes 103.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of ep-core and log4jrafalcan

Release 1.0.2 - 2012-06-19

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.1 - 2012-06-18

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0 - 2012-03-30

No changes in this release.
